Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-22796 affecting package openssl for versions less than 3.3.5-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-22796 affecting package openssl for versions less than 3.3.5-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssl is earlier than 3.3.5-3, affected by CVE-2026-22796
